title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify the file (e.g. move an existing class).
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save Icon. A dialog will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the filename, but ignore the file extension, as it is not requested.
6) Click Ok.

Observed Behavior: The file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but the file extension is not displayed.
EB: When saving a file with SaveAs, the file extension should be retained and displayed in the Navigator.
SR:
1) Open the Java file in the application.
2) Make changes to the file.
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save Icon.
4) In the dialog that appears, choose a valid container location.
5) Enter a filename without specifying the file extension.
6) Click Ok to save the file.

Expected Behavior: The file should be saved with the original file extension and the Navigator should display the file with its extension.
